Authors:
Arunpak Pitakpong, Ekaphan Kraichak, Khwanruan Butsathorn
Papong, Nooduan Muangsan, Pongthep Suwanwaree, H. Thorsten Lumbsch,
Robert L端cking
Title:
New species and records of the lichens genus Graphis
(Graphidaceae, Ascomycota) from Thailand, with a key to currently known
species
Abstract:
one new species and six new records of crustose lichens
genus Graphis are reported from Thailand. Graphis koratensis Pitakpong,
Kraichak, L端cking sp. nov. is characterized by lirelline ascocarps,
whitish- grey or grey- green, pruina along the slit, transversely
ascospores and norstictic acid. Our phylogenetic analysis strongly
supported the distinct position of this new species with the genus. Six
new records from Thailand included G. cincta (Pers.) Aptroot, G.
jejuensis K. H. Moon, M. Nakan. & Kashiw., G. nigrocarpa Adaw. &
Makhija, G. renschiana (M端ll. Arg.) Stizenb.,G. seminuda M端ll.Arg., and
G. subserpentina Nyl. With these new records, we provide a key of all of
the 57 currently known species from Thailand.
